about_the_game:
Nanokeeper is a short roguelite that blends strategy, action, and chaos in a minimalist battlefield. Your towers are your last line of defense, but don’t worry – they know how to fight back, while you focus on making strategic decisions.

Main Features:

  • Automatic Shooting: Towers fire and position themselves automatically, letting you focus on strategies and upgrades.
  • Collect and Upgrade: Defeat enemies to collect Nanos, the experience currency used to unlock improvements in a persistent skill tree.
  • Roguelite Progression: Every run is an opportunity to explore unique combinations of towers and upgrades, while the skill tree ensures you come back stronger each time.
  • Strategic Choices: At the end of each wave, select a temporary upgrade that can shift the course of the match.
Nanokeeper is an arcade shooter where the focus isn’t on protecting something – the towers are fighting to defend themselves. Add, attack, and conquer the arena in a game that uniquely blends chaos with control.
